title: Calories in Wonton Soup
meta_description: Discover the calorie in wonton soup per cup serving, including full nutrition breakdown, protein, sodium, and easy tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Chinese restaurant style; includes pork-filled wontons, vegetables, and chicken broth; approximately 240 ml per cup.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by restaurant, recipe, wonton filling, and portion size. Check labels or recipes when available.

quick_answer.text: One cup of wonton soup contains about 71 kcal and 3.5 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Use vegetable-filled wontons instead of pork

faqs.q: How many calories in one cup of wonton soup?
Is wonton soup high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, about 815 mg sodium per cup due to broth and seasonings.

faqs.q: What is the protein content in wonton soup?
faqs.a: Around 3.5 g protein per cup, mainly from the wontons.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in wonton soup?
faqs.a: Yes, about 6.7 g carbs per cup from wonton wrappers and vegetables.

faqs.q: How does homemade wonton soup compare calorie-wise?
faqs.a: Similar at 71 kcal per cup, but can vary with oil use or filling type.
